title: Catch Me If You Can
summary: A young con artist successfully impersonates a Pan Am pilot, a doctor, and a lawyer, all while being pursued by a seasoned FBI agent.

title: Groundhog Day
summary: A weatherman finds himself stuck in a time loop, repeating the same day over and over again, leading to self-discovery and personal growth.

title: Limitless
summary: A struggling writer takes a pill that allows him to unlock the full potential of his brain, leading to a whirlwind of success and danger.

title: Fight Club
summary: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club as a form of male bonding, but things spiral out of control when the club becomes more than it was intended to be.

title: The Way, Way Back
summary: A shy 14-year-old boy comes into his own during a summer spent with a carefree water park manager who teaches him valuable life lessons.

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
summary: A young man is wrongfully imprisoned and seeks revenge on those who betrayed him, embarking on a journey of transformation and redemption.

title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
summary: A man seeks to rediscover his manhood after his marriage falls apart, with the help of a bachelor who teaches him about love and relationships.

title: Elf
summary: A human raised by elves at the North Pole travels to New York City to find his biological father and discover the true meaning of Christmas.

title: Chakde! India
summary: A former hockey player coaches the Indian women's national field hockey team to victory, overcoming his past mistakes and inspiring his players to believe in themselves.

title: Guru
summary: The story of a man who rises from poverty to build an empire, facing numerous challenges while trying to achieve his dreams.

title: Rock On!!
summary: A group of friends reunites after years to revive their rock band, learning about the importance of friendship and following their passions.

title: My Name Is Khan
summary: An autistic man embarks on a journey to meet the president of the United States after being falsely accused of being a terrorist, spreading a message of love and tolerance.

title: Paa
summary: A son and his father share an extraordinary relationship as they both come to terms with the father's condition, teaching the values of acceptance and love.

title: Anand
summary: Anand, a terminally ill man, spreads joy and laughter around him despite his condition, inspiring those who know him to live in the present moment and cherish life.

title: Chhoti Si Baat
summary: The story follows a man who seeks drastic measures to change his life and the lives of others around him. A comedic take on making bold decisions in life.

title: The Lunchbox
summary: A mistaken lunchbox delivery leads to an unlikely friendship between a married woman and a middle-aged office worker, showing how life can change through simple exchanges.

title: Aamir
summary: A young man, newly returned to Mumbai, finds himself trapped in a dangerous situation, forcing him to make impossible choices in a tense, psychological thriller.

title: Makkhi
summary: A man is reincarnated as a fly after being killed by a ruthless businessman. The fly seeks revenge, blending action, fantasy, and emotional depth.
